| Overview                = The '''Red Circle''' was a magical merchant organization that operated in the [[Bazaar at the End of Unreason]].
| History                 = [[Stephen Strange (Earth-616)|Doctor Strange]] and [[Augustyne Phyffe (Earth-616)|Augustyne Phyffe]] approached a vendor of the Red Circle, as Doctor Strange needed to purchase a pinch of [[jyilla]] for his injury from fighting a [[Tauro-Demon (Earth-616)|Tauro-Demon]]. Augustyne attempted ask the merchant if he could purchase [[orphium]] but he inadvertently insulted the merchant.
